Title: Silverlight Ribbon
Description: A silverlight implementation of the Office 2007 Ribbon control.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A silverlight implementation of the Office 2007 Ribbon control.

I will update this site with a more detailed description of the control in the near future, but in the mean time there are some posts on my blog (http://home.infusionblogs.com/smatthews/default.aspx) regarding the Ribbon.

A live demo is hosted at Silverlight Streaming: http://silverlight.services.live.com/invoke/60108/SilverlightRibbon/iframe.html
